alert.note: Alert for Aiken; Edgefield; McCormick; Saluda (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 18 at 5:42PM EST by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Columbia, central Richmond, Edgefield, northwestern Aiken, southern Saluda and southeastern McCormick Counties through 630 PM EST... At 542 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles northwest of Edgefield to near Grovetown. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Aiken, North Augusta, Grovetown, Evans, Martinez, Fort Gordon, Augusta, Clearwater, Belvedere, Edgefield, Johnston, Ridge Spring, Glendale, South Augusta, Edgefield County Airport, Midtown, Riverwood, Summerville, Augusta Mall and Daniel Field. This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 in Georgia between mile markers 188 and 201. Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 0 and 18. Interstate 520 in Georgia between mile markers 1 and 15. Interstate 520 in South Carolina between mile markers 16 and 23. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
